title: Chaperone
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Wow~! Look, look, Kanata-san! There’s so many different kinds of cute fabric here~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah, yeah~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>There’s lots of chiffon and lace, too...! Ah, I bet this red suede would look really nice on Sis... Oh, and this fake leather looks so real that I couldn’t even tell...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Totally~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Um, did you need to do any shopping too, Kanata-san? Since we got here, you’ve just been tagging along with me...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ah, I came here just to show you the stores here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Huh...? Just because I said I wanted to go see the fabric shops in Tokyo? You came along even though you didn’t have anything you needed to get!? I-I’m sorry! Let’s go to a different shop then. I think there’s a nice cafe where we could continue–<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>No, don’t worry, it’s fine! I’ve been having toooooons of fun~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Huh? Why?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I think the way you put so much effort into your shopping is adorable~. It reminds me of when Haruka-chan went shopping for the first time back then...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Um... thanks...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Alright, then, don’t worry about me, go ahead and fully enjoy the 1st through 6th floors~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
